title: Our Sexy Step Secret
description: With both of his little brats at home, the man of the house is already facing twice the temptation. But when he realizes they're intent on sharing everything - including him - will he be able to handle twice the taboo fun?  Ever since little brat Macy moved in to John and Angela's Manhattan condo, the entire household has been turned upside down. Macy has had her way with the man of the house, and has already been a bad, bratty influence on his perfect little princess, Brittany. But now that they've shared their forbidden secrets for the first time, Macy wants to share more . . . and Brittany does too. Is the man of the house prepared for double the pleasure?
author: Aria Cantrelle
